assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was performed in line with the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. The Research Ethics Board at BC Children’s and Women’s Hospital approved this study (H20-01343).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all patients for being included in the study. All patient/personal identifiers have been removed or disguised so the patient/person(s) described are not identifiable and cannot be identified through the details of the story.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
